text: I have a huge breakfast every morning because I never know if I'll have time for lunch, especially during Fashion Week. It keeps my mood positive all day. And my parents taught me to have tons of fruit and vegetables, which I think helps my skin.
author: Constance Jablonski

text: I'm not really a morning person.
author: Steve Burton

text: Another thing that's quite different in writing a book as a practicing newspaperman is that if you look at what you've written the next morning and you think you didn't get it quite right, you can fix it.
author: Adam Clymer

text: It's a miserable life in Hollywood. You're up at five or six o'clock in the morning to be ready to start shooting at nine.
author: William Wyler

text: I went to Morocco, joined a band called Pegasus, ran out of money, went to Gibraltar and worked on the docks, writing songs about the sun and the morning and the birds.
author: Graham Parker
